name: Space Outvaders (Enci)
description:
Hi people,

This is my first upload on itach.io, and it's here for feedback so let me know what you think of the game.

The assets are not mine, they are from a course https://www.udemy.com/course/unreal-engine-4-learn-to-make-a-game-prototype-in-u...

You copntrol the ship with A & D, and shoot with J or SPACEBAR.
